_header: Jesu said these words meek / To his disciples whan spake
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Simon and Jude, saints
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo SS. Simonis et Iude’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Ihesu seide þis wordus mekeTo his disciples whon he
                    speke…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat suffren mekely al þis schomeffor me and also in
                    my nome

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
IHesu seide þeose wordus mekeTo his disciples whon he
                    speke…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þat suffren mekely al þis schameffor me and also in
                    my name
